1.「<pc>！ またまた 会ったのう。| アストルティアに 知らぬことなし！| ご: Aye, laddie! We meet again. Ya' know me,|Hollow. The wanderin' sage who's no|stranger to anything Astoltia.

But if this what we accomplished, we've done|well. If we spread the word about the elixir|used in this dish, I'm sure cooks all over|
|the world will be pleased.
